attributes.comment:
As a member of the adoption community, raising these fees will have a profound
impact on families pursuing international adoption. Adoption related fees are
already a burden on prospective parents, particularly when the time frame of the
adoption process goes beyond the expiration dates of the required USCIS
immigration documentation. Adoptive families have no control over the processing
time, therefore it is a great burden when we are required to reapply for I-600A,
fingerprints, etc because these documents expired. Since we are a country that
has a great reputation for humanitarian efforts and the support of families, I urge
you not to increase these fees. Thank you for your consideration.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Anonymous
